title: Cosmos (Serious Recruiting) !! Sup, Mid, Top, Adc !!
body:
I have been playing off and on for about 5 years , but recently have gathered insipration from lck and lcs teams, asa a result i am trying to put together a team with the same mindset as me. Acheive a higher level of understanding and skill throughout each game we play collectivly as a team. I have been a part of many teams and i have learned that many give up within the first week, well i am not one of those people , Here is where we begin our journey through the ladder!


YOU MAY MSG ME IGN OR LEAVE A COMMENT WITH 
discord y/n
role
current rank 
s6 rank 
experience and or what you feel you can bring to the team 
:)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Kloe,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=1W2XFNYi,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-03-14T00:11:09.242+0000)
>
> discord y/n: Yes if my computer is on I'm on discord
> role: ADC
> current rank: S4
> s6 rank: G5
> experience and or what you feel you can bring to the team: 
> I bring over 3 years of experience in botlane, I frequently obsess over studying the meta and the best strategies for team play.  I'm a very decisive late game shotcaller but mostly my skills come in being a very good teamfighting adc with a solid lane phase and consistent CS differential of 10-15+ at 10 and am devoting myself full time to playing league of legends and only go to school a few days a week. I am fully commited to joining a team and going as far as possible with it. I know my rank isnt great but please consider trying me out.

side note: I am available and want to practice every single day of the week

discord y/n : yes
role : adc
current rank : silver 3 solo, g5 flex
s6 rank: Gold 5
experience and or what you feel you can bring to the team:
Running a team and managing the practices, I am majorly dedicated to improving the game quality and trying to get the cleanest games as possible. Am able to shotcall and very decisive in it.

discord y/n yes
role adc/sup
current rank Gold4
s6 rank gold5
experience and or what you feel you can bring to the team Played in a couple ranked team's and tournament teams Strong mechanically and good at comunicating

discord y/n: y
role: jg
current rank: b3
s6 rank: s5
experience and or what you feel you can bring to the team: years in competitive gaming... ability to listen and learn on the fly.

discord y/n; Yes
role: mid
current rank: gold2
s6 rank: gold 5
experience and or what you feel you can bring to the team: i have had past team experince and i think i could bring a lot to a team.
